TopicTitle: The COMPLETE KSP Blender Tutorial! [Video Back!]

Articles.Content: hey does anyone know how to get an already existing part and edit it with blend so that I don't have to start from scratch

If I might chime in here. This tutorial while very informative back during KSP 0.15 or earlier in the development, 2 more maybe 3 new updates to blender have been released. Also there were no internal views in KSP yet. This tutorial really needs to be updated especially now with moving away from .DAE to .MU format. There is just so much that has changed from now until then. If somebody wants a chance to shine on these forums make a blender tutorial for the newer version of blender and KSP 0.20. It would be highly appreciated by alot of people and would only help KSP mod development by creating more and more mod developers. That is what helps make KSP great is it not?

Edited May 27, 2013 by Redneck
I don't think that KSP 0.20+ supports .DAE files anymore. All the parts are .mmu
